flawed_nl_solution:
Sue has 15-8 = <<15-8=7>>7 books left after returning at the library.
Sue returned 6/3 = <<6/3=2>>2 movies to the library.
Sue had 6-2 = <<6-2=4>>4 movies left.
Sue had 7+9 = <<7+9=15>>15 books after checking out at the library.
Sue has 15+4 = <<15+4=19>>19 movies and books combined.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
